title: Gameplay- DJ Sona Taunt and Joke are the same as normal Sona's.
body: In game, I was play as DJ Sona about 4 times. Every time I pressed Taunt or Joke, it was Classic Sona's joke and taunt. The animation would still go through, but the sound was of Classic.

replies.body:
Hey OneGirlOneBear,

Were you leveled up? Did you recently die? Any additional information you can provide would be great! ^-^

Hey Katey. On my phone so hope I can grammar good. But anyways, I had this problem in the last Sona game I played as well(it was about a week or two ago IIRC), except in addition she also wasn't using her DJ VO at all. Im afraid I can't remember if she started with her normal VO or it just switched to it midgame. However, the taunt/joke/laugh would play both VOs at once(IE her normal laugh would play on top of her wub laugh). Dunno if that helps, but I would like to see it fixed asap since she and Tahm are basically the only supports I play x3 I'll probably play a game later as her to see if I can recreate the issue.

I've seen a couple reports of this, but we've been unable to come up with a solid reproduction of the issue. It doesn't appear to be something that happens often. I haven't seen this issue myself, and I've played quite a bit of Sona. 

If you play her and are able to pin-point how this issue is occurring, please feel free to let me know!

It was right at the beginning of the game
I was just about to leash, in Kinetic form, didn't use or level up any spells yet.

how come nobody is helping with my bug but i see all these riot devs commenting on simple things...but not a bug that has been in game for 2 years and u guys clearly must know....http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/lE9PZa0q-jannasoraka-more-4-7-mastery-taunt-bug-gameplay 7 months my post has sat there and nothing come out of it...
